Description: Here's a Charvel Art Series EVH Signature Model in a factory original finish. It is in excellent condition and has been well cared for. The finish on the top is clean and has virtually zero playwear. The frets have zero play wear. One of the string locks is black - but other than that- she looks all original. The back is just as clean, only a few barely visible micro clear coat scratches - see pics. The hard wear is clean and the pickup is original. The neck is super smooth and arrow straight. It weighs 7.8 lbs. She has a fresh set up with d'addario 10/46's and has been calibrated. Comes with the original Charvel hardshell case and all paperwork and accessories as seen in the pictures. This guitar will be safely packed and shipped. Buyer to pay $60 FedEx shipping anywhere in the U.S. Full insurance included in shipping. California residents please add 8% sales tax. Local San Diego pickup always welcome. Will ship worldwide. International shipping guidelines: Buyer is responsible for any import duties. We can declare a low value. FedEx Ground to Canada is $175 with full insurance. FedEx or USPS Express is $245 to most parts of Europe and the UK. FedEx is $295 to Asia and Australia. Full insurance available. Please call or email me if you have any questions - 858-531-2287
